definitions.definition: One of many species of freshwater fish , in genus Xiphophorus , others of which are called platyfish .
Any of various papilionid butterflies that have a long sword-like projection from the tornal section of each hindwing .

main_definition: One of many species of freshwater fish , in genus Xiphophorus , others of which are called platyfish .
secondary_definitions: Any of various papilionid butterflies that have a long sword-like projection from the tornal section of each hindwing .
